Description: Brownware pottery beaker; incised decoration filled with white on exterior and interior; repaired from fragments.
Curator's comments: Published: R Friedman 'Badari Grave Group 569' in W. V. Davies (ed), Studies in Egyptian Antiquities: A Tribute to T. G. H. James (BM Occasional Paper 123, 1999), 1-11. [number misquoted as EA 59728?]
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
